title: Spaghetti with tuna
ingredients: ['1/2 tablespoon olive oil', '2 whole cloves of garlic, peeled', '1/2 tablespoon anchovy paste (optional)', '425g organic tomato passata', '210g good quality tuna canned in its own oil', '500g spaghetti', 'salt and pepper, as needed', '60g freshly chopped parsley']
